titles.title: Medicare Home Infusion Therapy Act of 2003
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage of home infusion drug therapies under the Medicare Program.
Medicare Home Infusion Therapy Act of 2003

bill.summary: Medicare Home Infusion Therapy Act of 2003 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to provide for coverage of home infusion drug therapy services.
